title: anyone getting this?
body:
weird lag or delay, randomly, ms goes from 35 to over 500 then settles, I've checked my connection its not a issue my end and i don't run anything else whilst playing league?

any suggestions on things to try?

I've only got this since siege appeared.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Definitely does sound like an issue on either your or your ISP's end.

Could you please do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.

Hi - I'm having a similar issue. 2 days ago ping started fluctuating between 66 and 400 or so every few seconds. Now it hovers between 130-200 but feels much worse. Before this started I had a stable 66 ping.

[WinMTR results](http://pastebin.com/iW0Rz96Q)
[ICSI netalysr results](http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/summary/id=369839a0-11188-a08931ab-82d6-4856-a325)

I'm with TPG living in Perth

Hey there,

From what I can see there appears to be some noticeable packet loss occurring on your path to League of Legends. It appears to be originating from your ISP's end of things. I would recommend to contact them.

From your ICSI Netalyzr results I can see one thing which I would recommend you to do just in general.

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
